nodes.text: Where isss it? Give me my amulet!
O great and marvelous Queen of the Dire Rats, I tremble to stand before you. Never have I seen anything as magnificent as you!
Yesss, I am magnifissent! You do well to grovel before me!
My amulet! Give me my amulet!
O Dire Rat Queen, most foul and despicable despot of Drats, I am again awed by your overwhelming stench and terrible taste in interior decorating.   All who see you flee before your fleabitten fury!
Yesss, my foesss flee before me!
Sssilence! Give me my amulet!
Your Highness, it's such a pleasure to see such a gracious and polite ruler of rodents. When I see one, I'll let you know.
Where isss my Amulet?
I had to slay the Giant Proach to get it, but I now have your magical amulet.
Give it! Give it! It isss mine!
My amulet! Yesss! I have it again!
Now you ssshall die for daring to enter my realm!
Wait! Whoa! I killed the Giant Proach for that necklace. You couldn't do that, could you? I've killed Drats for fun and profit. Do you really want me to kill you, too?
Go then - and never come back!
You know, that Proach is really, really big. It's very dangerous. I'm risking my life to get that amulet of yours.
Get me my amulet - or my Dire Rats will tear the castle apart!
Okay. All righty. Guess I'll just go kill that Giant Proach...
Why do you need me to get your amulet back? Why haven't your Drats gotten it for you?
My people cannot pierce the armor of the enemy. You must kill it and get me my amulet!
I've killed Proaches before. This should be no trouble at all!
Then go get it!

options.text: Tease the Queen About the Amulet

nodes.text: I'm going to make a wild guess that you really want your amulet back. You want me to get it for you. So why don't we make a deal?
I will kill you!
Now, now, killing me won't help you get your amulet back, will it?
(Hisssss) What isss it that you want?
First of all, you need to keep all your Dire Rats out of the castle. After all, why get them killed for nothing?
(Hisssss)
Then you need to give me something in trade for your amulet, I mean, I'm risking my life against the Proach and I'm giving you a pretty powerful magic item. You owe me something in trade.
(Hisssss)
So, is that a deal or what?
Give me my amulet!
Sure... I'll take that for a yes. And I'll also take something in trade... Let's see... There's a ring on the floor... I'll take that.
GIVE ME MY AMULET!
Sure, you don't have to get mad about it. You can have your amulet back.
My amulet! Yesss! I have it again!
Go - and never come back!
I'll go get it. I'll be back in a jiff. Ta-ta for now!

options.text: Refuse to Give the Queen the Amulet

nodes.text: You know something? You're nothing but a giant, ugly rat with delusions of grandeur. I'm not going to give you anything!
